item.title: Plot analyzation of COVID-19 cases in Toronto
item.description: Abstraction In the report, I analyze the dataset of infectious or probable cases in Toronto. Through a detailed discussion of four variables which are age group, client gender, FSA, and source of infection, the different outcomes of these variables have different numbers of infectious or probable cases. It provides us with ideas about COVID-19 virus which can protect us from it. Part 1 Introduction COVID-19, fully named Coronavirus disease 2019.
